role.argrole: thing in doing which arg0 loses more than gains

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 此) (QP (CD 一))) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 看似) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PU 「) (VCD (VV 除旧) (VV 更新)) (PU 」))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 政策))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 却)) (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (NN 居民)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VP (VV 得不偿失)) (PU ，) (VP (VP-FOC (VV 後悔)) (VP (VV 不已))))))))
